mapper.insert: insert into quiz(question, answer, commentary, insert_date, choice1, choice2, choice3, choice4, know_seq) values (#{question}, #{answer}, #{commentary}, now(), #{choice1}, #{choice2}, #{choice3}, #{choice4}, #{knowSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM learn_record l INNER JOIN quiz q ON l.quiz_seq = q.quiz_seq INNER JOIN (SELECT category_seq, know_seq FROM knowledge) AS c ON c.know_seq = q.know_seq WHERE is_right = 0 AND l.user_seq = #{userSeq};
